messages.message: @shaunak this known issue applies to customer deployments, too? Or was introduced in which version? and is fixed in which version? Do we have a Jira for this? If known issue, we can include in release notes (and if needed, we can document in a support alert)

@Barrie this is an issue in the current customer deployments, but because no one has been using the `scan_box` functionality, we havenâ€™t hit this issue on the customer side.  We did not file a bug yesterday while we were debugging the issue since it was internal, but if you think that it will be useful from a release perspective, we can do so as well.
